p.k: Toulouse, as quiet flows the river
p.d: Émilie Broussouloux takes us to explore Toulouse, a visit with water as its central theme. The history of the "pink city" has always been closely tied to that of its river. On the programme: the Bazacle hydroelectric power station, life on a barge, the Saint-Ferréol dam and water-skiing. Presented by: Émilie Broussouloux.
